thread.title: PHOTOS & VIDEOS: Baahubali Completes 100 Days, Fans Hungama And Celebrations
thread.title_full: PHOTOS & VIDEOS: Baahubali Completes 100 Days, Fans Hungama And Celebrations

title: PHOTOS & VIDEOS: Baahubali Completes 100 Days, Fans Hungama And Celebrations
text:
Posted by: Pravallika Anjuri Published: Sunday, October 18, 2015, 10:51 [IST] 
Rajamouli 's magnum opus Baahubali has indeed become India's biggest epic drama and was crowned as the nation's biggest blockbuster. Baahubali - The Beginning (Telugu) (U/A): Book Your Tickets Right Away! 
It has broken all the barriers and stood tall as an Indian film rather than a Telugu pride. It has not only proved the potentiality of regional cinema but has also expanded the market of Telugu cinema by leaps and bounds. 
It has shattered all the records and created a history which every movie buff will be proud of. Baahubali made the entire nation go crazy for almost about a month and it was the central pointo f conversations at all the places even now. 
While it is still on its way to reach more places, the film has completed 100 days of run. Fans, who are overwhelmed by the phenomenal success celebrated it to be a memorable occasion for the coming years. 
Check out Prabhas fans hungama and celebrations at the theaters screening Baahubali , in the slides below. PHOTOS & VIDEOS: Baahubali 100 Days Hungama And Celebrations 1/10
